settings.title: What is Presence?
settings.text: Presence is an inspirational quote board for today’s world. It is a beautifully designed Inspiration Display, created to stream fresh daily inspiration into your home or office.

settings.title: What is a Ray?
settings.text: A Ray is what is shown on your Presence. It is the pairing of words and art that brings you inspiration. You will see both animated and still Rays.

settings.title: What is a Raylist?
settings.text: A Raylist is a collection of Rays based on a theme. This is what you play on your Presence. Think of it like a music playlist but for inspiration.

settings.title: How do I get new Rays?
settings.text: Rays will automatically play on the Presence device even if you don’t connect it to the Internet. Use the Presence App to select and stream Rays. This will allow you to connect your device to the internet, browse all the Raylists, and choose exactly the right inspiration to match your mood.

settings.title: Is there a monthly subscription?
settings.text: No, there is no subscription cost or ads.

settings.title: What is the return policy?
settings.text: Every Presence order is backed by our happiness guarantee. Our return policy is 45 days from purchase.

settings.title: What are affirmations?
settings.text: An affirmation is a statement of positivity, intention, or inspiration intended to help a person make a change in their life.

settings.title: How does Presence use affirmations?
settings.text: We’ve expanded the traditional definition of affirmations to include everything from a Beatles lyric to a passage from the Sylvia Plath -- if it’s a statement of personal truth and moves you to be a better you, we believe it’s an affirmation!

settings.title: How are Rays related to affirmations?
settings.text: Rays are our version of the affirmation, comprised of a piece of wisdom + art to convey greater meaning and emotional impact as you see it change everyday on your Presence Display. We believe words have power and with great design or meaningful art, the power can be enhanced to help you receive the words more deeply.

settings.title: How many affirmations will I receive a day with Presence?
settings.text: That’s up to you! Use your Presence App to change the frequency at which your Presence updates.

settings.title: Who will provide affirmations?
settings.text: Raylists are curated by Inspirers, who range from authors, artists, speakers, athletes, professionals, other notable figures have partnered with Presence to share their inspiration, as well as the Presence team who produce a large portion of the Raylists library.

settings.title: Where can I find the app?
settings.text: The Presence App is available for download via the App Store and will be available on the Google Play before the end of 2022.

settings.title: Will the app work without a Presence Inspiration Display?
settings.text: Yes! You can explore all the Presence App has to offer without a device, so that when you’re ready to really make Presence an active part of your daily routine, you’re ready to leverage the power of our Inspiration Display.

settings.title: What are the app's user features?
settings.text: The Presence App is designed to give you full control of your experience and features simple, intuitive settings such as Sleep Mode, auto-dimming, and Ray Speed.

settings.title: How can I learn more about the Presence App?
settings.text: If you still have questions about the Presence App, feel free to reach out to us directly at hello@discoverpresence.co
